task.title: Replace The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: You can replace a typewriter platen by removing all platen shaft mechanisms and accessories, and attaching the shaft mechanisms and accessories to a new platen roller.

step.cmd: Remove the screw that connects the right-hand platen knob to the roller.
Remove the platen knob, shaft mechanisms, and washers from the platen roller shaft.
Locate the variable mechanism spring on the left hand side of the platen roller.
Use a hook tool to slide the variable mechanism spring prongs out of the slots in the platen roller.
Use a hook tool to slide the spring up and over the platen roller shaft collar.
Insert each prong on the variable mechanism spring into their respective slots on the new platen roller.
Use a hook tool to slide the springs over the platen shaft collar and into place.
Slide the washer, shaft mechanisms, and platen knob onto the end of the platen roller shaft.
Attach and install the screw that connects the right-hand platen knob to the platen roller shaft.
Follow the steps in the section titled "Insert the Platen Roller" to insert the newly refinished platen roller into your typewriter.
